ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I might race a hare, but I'd always lose. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I love to eat lettuce.
🐌 I am not very fast.

ocean.question: I’m a big sea creature with a long nose, named after a land animal.

hints.text: 🐘 I am named after a land animal with a trunk.
💦 I live in the ocean, not the jungle.
🌊 I use my long nose to find food in the sand.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can also squirt ink! What am I?

hints.text: 🎱 I have many arms.
⚫ I can change color to hide.
🐙 I use ink to escape predators.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a very flat body and both of my eyes on the same side! What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I blend in with the ocean floor.
👀 Both my eyes look in the same direction.
〰️ I am a very unique looking fish.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean and sings beautiful songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the biggest animal on Earth!
🎶 I use sound to communicate.
🌫️ I spout water from a hole on my head.

ocean.question: I am a colorful group of sea animals that create underwater structures. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I build homes for many fish.
🌈 I come in many different colors.
🏝️ You can find me in warm, shallow waters.

ocean.question: I am a large predator with many teeth and a reputation for being scary, but not all of my kind are dangerous. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🦷 Some people think I'm scary because of my teeth.
🌊 I live in the ocean, but I'm not a whale.

ocean.question: I am a large, floating piece of ice in the ocean. I can be very dangerous to ships. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of frozen water.
🚢 I can sink ships if they hit me.
🥶 Most of me is hidden underwater.

ocean.question: I am a powerful force of nature that can cause huge waves and damage coastlines. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am a type of storm.
🌊 I can cause flooding.
🌬️ Strong winds are part of me.

ocean.question: I am a deep and dark place in the ocean where very little light can reach. Many strange creatures live here. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I am very far down.
🔦 Some animals here make their own light.
🕳️ It's very difficult to explore.

plant.question: I wear a crown of green and stand tall, but I have no legs at all. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I have a bright face and love the sun, I turn to follow it until the day is done. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I am often yellow.
☀️ Farmers grow me in big fields.
🍪 You can eat my seeds.

plant.question: I'm red, juicy, and grow on a vine. I'm a favorite in salads, and taste so divine. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am often used in salads.
🔴 My color is red.
🪴 I grow on a vine.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful petals, and smell sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a gift.
💔 Be careful of my thorns.
💐 People give me on Valentine's Day.

plant.question: I grow underground, and I'm long and orange, rabbits love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me.
✨ I am healthy to eat.
🚜 You pull me from the ground.

plant.question: I'm a seed that pops into a fluffy treat, often enjoyed at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am delicious with butter.
🌽 I start as a kernel.
🎬 You eat me at the cinema.

plant.question: I have a trunk, but I carry no clothes. I give you fruit, if the season allows. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 You can eat my fruit.
🪵 My trunk is made of wood.
🌸 I blossom in the spring.

plant.question: I am a vegetable, but people think I'm a fruit. I have seeds on the inside and grow after a flower turns yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am orange.
🍁 People carve me at Halloween.
🥧 You can make pie from me.

plant.question: I am a green leafy plant with a strong smell, often used to flavor pizza and pasta. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I smell very fragrant.
🇮🇹 I am used in Italian cooking.
🍕 I go well with tomato sauce.

plant.question: I am a plant that lives in the desert and has sharp needles instead of leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I don't need much water.
🌵 I am often found in Arizona.
🩹 My needles protect me.
